item.title: x86 Windows Remote Buffer Overflow Cheatsheet
item.description: Template code Prerequisites Windows VM Immunity Debugger PATH contains C:\python27 C:\python27\Pycommands\mona.py Linux VM Kali, Parrot, custom build Both VMs need to contact each other A will to live Windows VM Launch Immunity Debugger as Administrator File > Open > vulnserver.exe Set it to run Repeat after every crash Linux VM Scan the victim IP nmap -p- <ip> Connect to the port where the app listens on
